## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registermcreginfofn">RegisterMCRegInfoFn</a> - Helper template for registering a target register info implementation.

This invokes the specified function to do the construction. Usage:

extern &quot;C&quot; void LLVMInitializeFooTarget() &#123; extern <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/target">Target</a> TheFooTarget; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/registermcreginfofn">RegisterMCRegInfoFn</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X(TheFooTarget, TheFunction)</a>; &#125;

Definition at line 1200 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/targetregistry-h">TargetRegistry.h</a>.
